lead_paragraph: Former champion Matt Kuchar continued his love affair with the Memorial tournament on Friday as he took advantage of calm conditions with a late birdie flurry to surge into a two-way tie for the lead in the second round.

headline.print_headline: Late Birdie Blitz Earns Kuchar Tie for Memorial Lead
headline.main: Late Birdie Blitz Earns Kuchar Tie for Memorial Lead
